info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:39AM EST until January 20 at 6:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST /5 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Additional snow amounts of 2 to 4 inches expected. Locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...In Indiana, La Porte County. In Michigan, Berrien County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST /5 PM CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to snow covered roads and rapidly changing visibilities from both the falling snow and patchy blowing snow. The hazardous conditions will impact mainly this morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A heavier band of snow is expected this morning over portions of LaPorte and Berrien counties with snowfall rates of 1 inch or more per hour possible. There is still some uncertainty about how far west the band will settle into LaPorte county, but locally higher amounts are expected in that location.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
